desc: Built a responsive landing page with HTML, CSS, JQuery/Javascript to attract investors to pre-order our product. Integrated Paypal API to provide a payment system for processing the pre-orders.

Participated in various combat training exercises as rifleman and squad leader in the 21st Airborne Battalion. Jumped from CH-47 and CH-53 aircrafts at 1300ft altitude for parachute training exercises. Trained with the US Marines in the KMEP joint military exercises.

Built a cross-platform hybrid application that allows coding instructors to remotely teach students from various academies in Seoul through a platform that allows screen sharing with remote desktop control access and voice chat. Built the full-stack application with React, Electron and Django and configured the live production server with Docker and NGINX.

Used React and Redux to build a frontend module that can be used by customer care professionals to find supplier information. Improved UX by using predictive search dropdowns and collapsible panels. Implemented infinite scrolling and lazy loading to improve overall performance.
Responsible for recruiting, inducting and training 24 programming tutors who support first year computer science students in developing skills in programming with C, Java, Haskell and Python.
Working with distributed event-driven microservices using Go, PostgreSQL, Kafka, BDD testing, Kubernetes, and building internal UI applications with React, Typescript, NodeJS and MongoDB.
Leading development and maintenance of the Flowverse NFT platform and marketplace, implementing smart contracts, and providing technical guidance for new initiatives.
Leading a team of engineers, spearheading system architecture design, delivering new features and enhancements to the platform, and mentoring junior engineers.
